Name: Ascended
About the game: Bend Light & Time To Your Will! Ascended is an interesting take on the puzzle genre & can be played in either first or third person with support for keyboard/mouse and controller. In the game levels are unlocked in a linear fashion as players complete the puzzles of rooms and direct beams of light to the next room but there is nothing stopping players from returning to previous levels if they choose. Players utilise a variety of abilities to aid them in accomplishing these puzzles, from the ability to shift time back & forth to the ability to manipulate the scaling, position and more of objects!
